entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 7.
